root.name: Nihilumbra
root.description: OverviewNihilumbra has the player negotiating their way through a mysterious world referred to as the "Void". With each chapter, the player unlocks new abilities that has them alter the world to help them get through each stage. The game is narrated by an omnipotent, unknown voice through the means of text that appears on the in-game environment. The game is currently available for iPhone and iPad, though it's currently being processed on Steam's Greenlight service. It won a Runner-Up Apple App Store Game of the Year award in 2012.
